snippet: Shinsuke Yamanaka of Japan stopped Mexico’s Tomas Rojas 36 seconds into the seventh round on Saturday to retain the World Boxing Council bantamweight title.
lead_paragraph: Shinsuke Yamanaka of Japan stopped Mexico’s Tomas Rojas 36 seconds into the seventh round on Saturday to retain the World Boxing Council bantamweight title.

headline.seo: Yamanaka Beats Rojas in W.B.C. Bantamweight Bout
